There are many different types of clubs at Chabot. There aren't as many activities.

There aren't any that I know of.
There is just normal food which is a little overpriced, but all college food is.
The professors are friendly and helpful. Just make sure you stay on top of your work and don't wait until last minute.

textAfterTable: Food and Dining There are two places if you need snack and a big place to eat the cafeteria. Dorm Life The classes are good. Academic Rigor It's a great college to go to. Tips for prospective students Don't miss class. Do your work and apply for financial aid! In three sentences Chabot college is a great college. The students and teachers are great. When ever you need help you get help fast. The financial aid is always there to answer question. It's a great college.
